contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Ukrainian raion | name=Zalischyky Raion | Ukrainian_name=Заліщицький район | location_map=Zalischynskyi-Raion.png | country=[[Ukraine]] | region=[[Ternopil Oblast]] | date_created=1940 | population=52915 | area=684 | density=77.36 | phone_code=380-3554 | postal_index= | administrative_center=[[Zalischyky]] | cities=1 | urban-type_settlements=1 | villages=53 | website= | governor= }} The '''Zalischyky Raion''' ({{lang-uk|Заліщицький район}}) is a sub-division of the [[Ternopil Oblast]]. The administrative centre and largest town is [[Zalischyky]]. The rest of the district's population lives in one of 35 village councils or 53 rural settlements. == Demographics == * '''Population:''' 53,400 (2001) [http://www.ukrcensus.gov.ua/eng/results/general/estimate/Ternopil/] [http://www.xist.org/cntry/ukraine.aspx?levels=Ternopil%C2%B4s%C2%B4ka] ** (In 1989 the population was 56,300 - a decline of 5%) * '''Density:''' 85 * '''Life expectancy:''' 71 * '''% Urban population:''' 25% [http://www.ukrcensus.gov.ua/eng/results/general/urban-rural/Ternopil/] == Geography == * '''Area:''' 684 km² [http://www.ethnia.org/ethnia-fiche.php?ask=UA-WE-GA-TP-ZA] == Communities == * Towns ** [[Zalischyky]] * Urban type settlements and villages **[[Bedrikovtsy]] **[[Blishchanka]] **[[Buryakovka]] **[[Dobrivlyany]] **[[Dorohichovka]] **[[Dunov]] **[[Horodok, Ternopil Oblast|Horodok]] **[[Ivane-Zolotoe]] **[[Kasperovtsy]] **[[Khmelevaya]] **[[Kolodribka]] **[[Koshilevtsy]] **[[Lisichniki]] **[[Lisovtsy]] **[[Lityachi]] **[[Mishkov]] **[[Nahoryany]] **[[Nirkov]] **[[Novoselka]] **[[Podelye]] **[[Popovtsy, Ternopil Oblast|Popovtsy]] **[[Sadki]] **[[Shchitovtsy]] **[[Shipovtsy]] **[[Shutromintsy]] **[[Synkiv]] **[[Slobodka, Ternopil Oblast|Slobodka]] **[[Solenoe]] **[[Tolstoe]] **[[Torske]] **[[Uhrinkovtsy]] **[[Ustechko]] **[[Vinohradnoe]] **[[Vinyatintsy]] **[[Vorvulintsy]] **[[Zelenyy Hay]] **[[Zozulintsy]] **[[Zvonyach]] {{Ternopil Oblast}} {{coord missing|Ukraine}} [[Category:Raions of Ternopil Oblast]] {{Ternopil-geo-stub}} [[be-x-old:Залешчыцкі раён]]
